topic.title: Handshake Failure Error When Accessing an HTTPS (SSL) Resource

section.title: Problem
section.p: When attempting to access an HTTPS (SSL) resource, I receive a handshake_failure error. What can I do?

section.title: Solution
section.p: The issue is most likely due to the limitation of Java cryptography capabilities. A solution might be to download and deploy Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files 8 (for Java 8).It is possible that this may not be legal in your country. Please understand that you bare legal responsibility for activating unlimited strength Java cryptography capabilities, so you should consult with your legal department before proceeding.

To deploy it in , unpack the downloaded zip archive and move the two jar files from UnlimitedJCEPolicyJDK8 to the following directory:
Windows - /jre/lib/security
Linux - /jre/lib/security
Mac OS X - /jre.bundle/Contents/Home/jre/lib/security
